getMobilePropertyAdditionalInfo

Overview

This call is used when the property details need to append the other fields coming from property service BSGv3 that aren’t available on BSGv2 such as folio, volumn and siteValueList; it uses BSGv3’s property service.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
Yes No

Request

Parameters

Parameter Description Required
op Operation Yes
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
propertyId Property Id Yes

Sample Request

{ "op": "getMobilePropertyAdditionalInfo", "uid": "TWISTUSER001", "sid": "2-4eed242594fc464787b8054ddc77de11", "propertyId": "7764519" }

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success", "result": { "occupancyType": "Owner Occupied", "mapReference": "UBD NSW: CCT40, L4", "folio": "", "volume": "", "saleDate": "17/09/2009", "salePrice": "415000", "siteValueLists": [], "isAgentAdvised": false } } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "" } }
